articles.title: UK ready 'soon' to move to 'Level 3' of lockdown as coronavirus infections fall - Mirror Online
articles.description: Business Secretary Alok Sharma said he hoped the coronavirus threat level can be downgraded from 'severe' to 'substantial' in the near future if infection rates fall
articles.content:
The UK will "soon" be in a position to lower the level of lockdown restrictions - as long as the rate of infection falls, a cabinet minister said.
